name: Soil erosion by water (RUSLE2015)
description: Dataset (GIS map) that shows the Soil Loss by Water Erosion in Europe and is the result of applying a modified version of the Revised Universal Soil Loss Equation (RUSLE) model.
license_other: The permission to use the data specified above is granted on condition that, under NO CIRCUMSTANCES are these data passed to third parties. They can be used for any purpose, including commercial gain.
access_barrier: Access to the data needs to be granted (e.g. dataset owner needs to give permission after user registration; dataset owner sends data after receiving a request email)
data_formats: Widely used file formats (Spreadsheet, JSON, GeoJSON, SHP, GPX, KML, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
